patterns_discovered.redundant_module_reference: Incorrect double module access pattern (cocotb.cocotb) instead of direct import (cocotb)
patterns_discovered.import_patterns: Direct import usage preferred over nested module access
patterns_discovered.async_test_setup: cocotb.start_soon() used for starting clock generators in test setup

gotchas_discovered.nested_module_access: Common mistake of accessing modules through themselves instead of direct import
gotchas_discovered.circular_import_risk: Redundant references can indicate potential import structure issues
gotchas_discovered.cocotb_specific: cocotb module should be accessed directly, not through itself

approach_outcome.efficiency: Direct fix in single line modification

recommendations.import_review: Review all cocotb imports for redundant module references
recommendations.lint_rules: Add linter rule to detect cocotb.cocotb patterns
recommendations.code_review_checklist: Include nested module reference check in review process
recommendations.documentation: Update cocotb usage guidelines to highlight direct import patterns
